Interface JsonComponentFramework

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ComponentFramework, space.arim.universal.util.Stringable
    All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface JsonComponentFramework
extends ComponentFramework
    Contains common documentation for JsonComponent and JsonComponentBuilder
